Class MIPSRegAlloc

  • java.lang.Object
    • MIPSRegAlloc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MIPSCGConstants

    public class MIPSRegAlloc
extends java.lang.Object
implements MIPSCGConstants
    Manages register allocation during assembler code generation.
    Author:
    Bennet, MLB and others
